channel.title: Well since only time can tell
channel.description:
I know they're a lot of these kind of topics today, but tell me your thoughts whether Jagex will stay with the current system, or go back to the orginal one.
As with the SS riot back in January, I believe they will switch it, mostly because of the uproar in game, and on the forums{topic in rants section with nearing 20k+ posts} but not totally undo it, they probably will bring back pking imo.

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

i was always thinking of jagex, making tons of gp and selling it at half price. that would make them frigging rich, and then ban the idiots buying the money. that way , they dont ruin the game and make money. but if they are caught they will be sued for fraud and shit.

Read full topic
item.source: Well since only time can tell

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

[quote=“Dizzy, post:19, topic:164005”]Maybe everyone should just chill for a bit and see what they have in store for us next year? I’ve been reading some articles in the knowledge base, like the ‘RS vs RWT’ and by the looks of it, they may have something big for us.

Even one of the staff members said that they knew it would be a bumpy ride to remove features such as PKing, but after that they’ll be able to focus on updating the game rather than its security. I have a feeling something BIG (much bigger than summoning) will be coming next year.[/quote]

Jsgex is definately planning something big. They have to make up for all the crappy updates they made to stop some people from making money off the game besdes them.

Read full topic
item.source: Well since only time can tell

item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:56, topic:164005”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=222736.msg1996160#msg1996160 date=1200327569]

Isn’t it a rule to only have 1 account?

No.
[/quote]
Yes.

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=3.msg8#msg8 date=1140643360]
Rule 11:
We only have one Forum account per person for Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org. If you get banned, email an admin, or get a friend to contact an admin. If you have trouble logging in, click ‘forgot my password.’
[/quote][/quote]

He meant on RuneScape, not on Moparisthebest.

Read full topic

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Dizzy, post:21, topic:164005”][quote author=Phree xp link=topic=222736.msg1927301#msg1927301 date=1197515455]
Why don’t they make it so money can’t be brought into the wild?
[/quote]

They already did, but according to them that wont stop the traders and I see how. Not only are they trying to stop RWT, but also ways of “unfairly” trading stuff over to a lower level account of yours. I both agree and disagree with their methods. First of all, I think that giving YOUR items to YOUR own account is 120% fair. Why? Because you already spent the hard work and time getting the money, or skill, to get the achieved item. Of course, that still is an unfair advantage since you’re making a lower level character with much more expensive and better equipment.[/quote]
Isn’t it a rule to only have 1 account?

Read full topic
item.source: Well since only time can tell

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“MrPotatoHead, post:52, topic:164005”]As an ex member you can use as many of the members slots you want for non member items so long as you don’t remove all the items in the slot - didn’t you know that?
You wouldn’t need to add any items, you future proof your ex members account for free to play. It’s an ex members benefit people have been using for years.
With jagex’s current attitude towards the game, it wouldn’t be beyond reason for them to remove it, to ‘encourage’ players back to members status.[/quote]

That’s what I’ve been saying; learn to read, dipshit.

MrPotatoHead:

You know it’s not that difficult to make it run in italian, spanish, greek and even asian fonts. Jagex does have programmers. They did it in german…

Programmers != professional linguists. Languages != fonts. Moron.

MrPotatoHead:

Can they rollerskate?

Occasionally.

Read full topic
item.source: Well since only time can tell

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Clearly you have no experience with life. The bank is locked at a certain number of slots. If you remove an item to add a new item in, you cannot. Simple as that.

As an ex member you can use as many of the members slots you want for non member items so long as you don’t remove all the items in the slot - didn’t you know that?
You wouldn’t need to add any items, you future proof your ex members account for free to play. It’s an ex members benefit people have been using for years.
With jagex’s current attitude towards the game, it wouldn’t be beyond reason for them to remove it, to ‘encourage’ players back to members status.

xxlegitxx:

And no, the interface is German and English.

You know it’s not that difficult to make it run in italian, spanish, greek and even asian fonts. Jagex does have programmers. They did it in german…

xxlegitxx:

Yes, Microsoft uses pixies.

Can they rollerskate?

Read full topic

And YOU don’t think they can make the interface work for other languages???
I wonder how microsoft do it then? they must use pixies.

WAIT, oh dear your THAT idiot… when i said they was ending drop trading and putting an end to rwt, you said, and i quote :

[quote author=xxlegitxx]
No it won’t, because it’s not happening, because MrPotatoHead is full of shit.[/quote]

xxlegitxx- fuck off you badger fucking, limp wristed, deodorising vaginal wetwipe.[/quote]

ur the f tard with the name mrfaggedpotatoe.

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“MrPotatoHead, post:47, topic:164005”]they will not be undoing the updates, don’t you people read the jagex site?

exe626 said it, they can now sell the gold themselves.
It’s simply real world economics. Jeez, it’s why they got rid of RWT. It’ll be a members benefit, like most other games out there.

The GE is for all the foreign players who can’t speak english on world 2, if you read their site they do say they want to expand the game to non english countries, probably india, china and malaysia. big markets.

I wouldn’t be supprised if they went further and started deleting inactive accounts, and just to really fuck you up, make the first 60 bank slots the only slots you could use as an ex-member.

Oh and why should they care about what any player wants, they’re a dot com for gods sake!!![/quote]

That was the most shitfaced post I have ever read. I’ll debunk it just like Loose Change.

They’re not undoing the updates, but they will make changes to keep people happy. THAT’S WHAT THEY SAID.

No, they aren’t going to sell gold themselves. It has nothing to do with real world economics.

The GE isn’t for foreign people. You think they can read and understand the entirely English/German interface but can’t type ‘Buying shit’? Common sense, retard.

They won’t delete inactive accounts, because there is no point whatsoever. And an ex-member can only use number of bank slots a free player can, so shut the fuck up.

And yes, they would care, because unhappy customers = no customers. Is that such a difficult concept to understand? Retard?

Read full topic
item.source: Well since only time can tell

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

they will not be undoing the updates, don’t you people read the jagex site?

exe626 said it, they can now sell the gold themselves.
It’s simply real world economics. Jeez, it’s why they got rid of RWT. It’ll be a members benefit, like most other games out there.

The GE is for all the foreign players who can’t speak english on world 2, if you read their site they do say they want to expand the game to non english countries, probably india, china and malaysia. big markets.

I wouldn’t be supprised if they went further and started deleting inactive accounts, and just to really fuck you up, make the first 60 bank slots the only slots you could use as an ex-member.

Oh and why should they care about what any player wants, they’re a dot com for gods sake!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Well since only time can tell
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:43, topic:164005”][quote author=ThatOneServer link=topic=222736.msg1976293#msg1976293 date=1199494169]
Heres what jagex needs to do:
Make dummy websites, that claim to sell a mil for $2.
People will fall for it, every IP and name will be monitored.
If the last ip on the account matches the IP of the buyer, they ban the account on suspisions.
People will figure out that they are rigging sites, and will be afraid to buy gp
[/quote]Or they could just sell the gold and make an easy profit? Jagex could run an underground black market and make loads off this. It’s not like they’re working for the gold or items, they’re spawning them. Jagex would be making a shit load from that. Blind business men have never gone so far.[/quote]

Its basically the perfect crime; If you want to call it that…
They “Sell” the gold,
They “Try” to “Stop” the gold.

Read full topic

@person1936 wrote:

wait…is attack shown or hiddin chosen on server side or client side because if its client side…i can cause rs massaur until they undo updates with special client and

They will NEVER make rs botless is it nearly impossible. And why the hell do they care so much about RWT? Someone earned the money and is selling it to you for the money that you earned. Once you get right down to it, you earned that money, so Jagex, fuck off of RWT.
ya thats true and ive been botting on multiple accounts and i can turn the No-wildy into my advantage for botting because than botts wont get PKed when killing greter demonds
